blogPost.excerpt: A simple, free companion app for the make time framework by Jake Knapp and John Zeratsky,

blogPost.title: Make Time App - Make time for what matters
blogPost.author: Harshit Beniwal

localize.description: 由Jake Knapp和John Zeratsky为make time框架设计的一款简单、免费的配套应用。

previous.excerpt: Writer is beautiful, secure and fast text editor and notes app for iPhone, iPad and soon for Mac and Apple Watch. It has many features like Markdown support, syncing between devices via secure Apple Cloud, customizable typography and more...
previous.title: Writer - Beautiful, fast, Apple native notes app with Markdown

localize.description: Writer是一款美观、安全、快速的文本编辑和笔记应用，适用于iPhone、iPad，不久还适用于Mac和Apple Watch。它有许多功能，如Markdown支持，通过安全的Apple Cloud在设备之间同步，可定制的排版等等。
localize.tagline: 美丽、快速、带Markdown的苹果原生笔记应用。

localize.description: Writer是一款美觀、安全、快速的文本編輯和筆記應用，適用於iPhone、iPad，不久還適用於Mac和Apple Watch。它有許多功能，如Markdown支持，通過安全的Apple Cloud在設備之間同步，可定製的排版等等。
localize.tagline: 美麗、快速、帶Markdown的蘋果原生筆記應用。

next.excerpt: Get your Google Sheets data as a direct link tocsv orjson file that is always up to date. Forget about downloading file and then re-uploading it again somehwere else!
next.title: Sheet2data - Direct URL to a .csv or .json with your Google Sheets data

localize.tagline: 将您的Google Sheets数据直接连接到.csv或.json的URL。

localize.tagline: 將您的Google Sheets數據直接連接到.csv或.json的URL。
